title: Greaves Electric Mobility secures govt approval for incentives under EMPS scheme
description: Greaves Electric Mobility has received approval from the Heavy Industries Ministry for incentives under the Union Government's Electric Mobility Promotion Scheme 2024. The company's two-wheeler models Nexus, Primus, Magnus, and Zeal are now eligible for government subsidies. This move aims to enhance accessible and sustainable mobility across India.
